alert.note: Alert for Butler; Greenwood (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 02 at 7:04PM CDT until May 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Butler County in south central Kansas... Southwestern Greenwood County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 800 PM CDT. * At 703 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near El Dorado, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Dorado, Eureka, Leon, Rosalia, Eureka City Lake, El Dorado Airport, Beaumont, El Dorado Lake, El Dorado State Park and Eureka Airport. This includes Interstate 35 between Mile Markers 69 and 76. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
